top.title: MODERN ART GALLERY
top.description: The arts in the collection of the Modern Art Gallery all started from a spark of inspiration. Will these pieces inspire you? Visit us and find out.

middle.title: Your Day at the Gallery
middle.description: Wander through our distinct collections and find new insights about our artists. Dive into the details of their creative process.

bottom.title: COME & BE INSPIRED
bottom.description: Weâ€™re excited to welcome you to our gallery and see how our collections influence you.

footer.description: The Modern Art Gallery is free to all visitors and open seven days a week from 8am to 9pm. Find us at 99 King Street, Newport, USA.
